Flow.description: this will be used from the Account>Create New Job button. It is consolidate 3 screens into one

dynamicChoiceSets.description: used to pass lookup values of key team members
dynamicChoiceSets.name: choice_KeyTeamMembersID

formulas.description: used to pull in the job creator's name on first scrent
formulas.name: forT_JobCreatorName

Flow.label: New Job Flow

fields.name: Complete
fields.fieldText:
You successfully created the Job!


Click here to view your New Job

textTemplates.name: ClaimScript
textTemplates.text: Related to Insurance Claim - Determine if this involves an insurance claim - if so, collect as much insurance information as possible (click checkbox for fields)

textTemplates.description: used for damage descrption screen questions
textTemplates.name: DamageDescriptionScript
textTemplates.text: Damage Description Detail all notes about damage for Operations Team Special Concerns Is there power at the property ? Do you need a generator? Is the property vacant or occupied? Is the property single or multi-level? Has the source of the damage been identified/repaired? Contents Damage Have any contents or personal property been damaged? What was damaged and what is rough estimated value of items? Does anything need to be removed ASAP?

textTemplates.name: IntroScript
textTemplates.text: Ask for a property name to include any relevant unit, suite, or store number
